title: Google releases Android 12 QPR3 Beta 1.1 for the Pixel 6 series to patch some issues
content:
Google published the first beta build of Android 12 Quarterly Platform Release (QPR) just over two weeks ago, giving us our first big glimpse at the upcoming Pixel Feature Drop. However, it introduced a handful of issues on the Pixel 6 series, such as abnormal battery drain and degraded call quality. Fortunately, the bugs have

The post Google releases Android 12 QPR3 Beta 1.1 for the Pixel 6 series to patch some issues appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is rolling out Android 12 QPR3 Beta 1.1 to address a few bugs that were present in the initial release. Check out the changelog!
